name: iCubing
short_description: OLAP technology is very useful for decision makers and data mining tools with BIG data. In this direction, we implement iCubing project with several multidimensional data cube approaches for cube indexing, querying, updating and mining. There are also several cube types, i.e. alphanumeric cubes, text cubes with unstructured data and geo cube with geo types, dimensions, measures and hierarchies, so the OLAP area continues a hard challenge after more than 20 years of the seminal paper of Jim Gray et al. in 1997. Our team has more than 10 years of experience in developing OLAP kernels.
summary: Several OLAP algorithms, data structures and HPC OLAP versions
